voice.text: Come visit my little pawnshop! General equipment and such. Don't miss it!

parameter.value: I have shovels, picks, scythes, bags, ropes, backpacks, plates, scrolls, watches, some lightsources, and other stuff. Just ask me for a {trade}.
Hello sweetie. If you need general {equipment}, stuff like that, let me know.
Of course, just browse through my wares. Remember that if you buy vials of oil, there's a deposit of 5 gold on the empty one.
